-Logged on to a Dust II game

-Planned out playing style this round (P90 and rush B)

-Ate a Top Kek

-Cried myself to sleep on account of my uncle beating me with his rings and shouting League of Legends propoganda

-He should have P90 and rushed B

-8 hours later I was kicked

-Logged on to Office

-Decided to P90 and rush B

-When I join, all I hear is "Сука Блять хуесос иди нахуй уебак рак"

-I then realized the Soviets have invaded

-Understanding that hope is futile, I down a bottle of eyeglass cleaner and eat a mango with a hornet nest inside

Valve/10   Would P90 and rush B while killing myself again
